disclaimer.text:
Please make sure you are eligible for getting your record cleared. If you need help with this please look at our FAQ.

Be aware your statement is stored locally on your device, and never transmitted to our servers or any third-party.

This software is developed by a non-governmental third party, Hack for LA.

Please allocate enough time to complete this.

Please also review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use before beginning.

welcomePage.description: This tool will guide you through writing your declaration letter. You can preview your letter and make changes at the end of each section.

step2.description: Now that you have introduced yourself, it’s time to start writing your letter.

step3.description:
Now that you have completed the first section of your letter, it’s time to write the next section.

Take a break now if you need one.

step4.description:
Now that you have completed the second section of your letter, it’s time to write the final section.

Take a break now if you need one.

step5.description:
Just one more step. Next, you can preview your entire letter and make changes.

When you are done, email or download a copy of your letter.
